column4: Any TV viewing applications other than xawtv and mythtv ......  ?
theres one for kde... i never tried it, but there is one... also, i think you can use mplayer... but never tried it..
wow mplayer? If you can guide me from where I can install it plz ?
you will need to change your repositories i think to get mplayer... there are also non-free codec you may need to download... but i cant step you through it...
